lom:description.lom:string: "How we rank graduate engineering programs. Programs at 198 engineering schools that grant doctoral degrees were surveyed; 189 responded. Data were collected in fall 2008 and early 2009. Rankings for 189 schools that provided the data needed were calculated based on a weighted average of the 10 indicators described below. All schools are listed in the online directory"

lom:title.lom:string: U.S. News Engineering Program Rankings Methodology
